# Emergency Response Team Procedures In the event of an Emergency Response Team boarding the station, the station alert should be set to [color=Magenta]Gamma Alert[/color] until the threat is dealt with.
1. All station personnel, including command members, are to stand down, and allow the ERT to take over station functions.
2. All security and/or relevant department members are to assist the ERT in their objectives, to the best of their abilities.
3. The Nanotrasen Representative is required to give a statement and/or a report to the ERT, detailing the situation.
